document.full_text: tens of millions of nigerians voted on saturday in the most credible presidential election for decades, with early results pointing to a close race between president goodluck jonathan and rival muhammadu buhari.
document.title: nigerians out in force for presidential vote
lines_and_colors: tens of millions of nigerians voted on saturday in the most credible presidential election for decades, with early results pointing to a close race between president goodluck jonathan and rival muhammadu buhari.
